marshland; swamp; salted or pickled vegetables; to mince; to shred; to mince human flesh and bones; Taiwan pr. [ju1]

菹字的基本解释

菹
zū
酸菜，腌菜。
多水草的沼泽地带：菹草。
剁成肉酱，切碎：菹醢（古代把人剁成肉酱的一种酷刑）。
肉：麋鹿为菹。
枯草：菹薪。

菹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zū］
［《廣韻》側魚切，平魚，莊。］
亦作“葅1”。
(1)腌菜。
(2)肉酱。
(3)古代一种酷刑，把人剁成肉酱。
(4)枯草。参见“菹薪”。
(5)芭蕉。
(6)草席。参见“菹稭”。
[②]［jù］
［《集韻》將預切，去御，精。］
“蒩2”的被通假字。
(1)水草丛生的沼泽地。
(2)通“沮”。湿润。参见“菹2漏”。

菹字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菹； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1040第09
【唐韻】側魚切，音䶥。【說文】酢菜也。【釋名】菹，阻也。生釀之，遂使阻于寒溫之閒，不得爛也。【詩·小雅】疆埸有瓜，是剝是菹。【禮·祭統】水草之菹。【註】芹茆之屬。【侯鯖錄】細切曰齏，全物曰菹，今中國皆言齏，江南皆言菹。　又【集韻】子邪切，音嗟。澤生草曰菹。【孟子】驅蛇龍而放之菹。　又地名。【穆天子傳】南征至于菹。＃

考證：〔【詩·小雅】疆場有瓜〕　謹照原文疆場改疆埸。
菹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

Chu
Basic explanation of words
Chu
zū
Sauerkraut, pickled vegetables.
The swampy area with watery grasses: Potamogeton crispus.
Chopped into meat sauce, finely chopped: 膢醢 (an ancient torture to chop people into meat sauce).
Meat: Elk is kosher.
Withered grass: 菹 pay.
Chu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zū］
["Guangyun" side fish cut, flat fish, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "菹1".
(1) Pickles.
(2) Meat sauce.
(3) A type of torture in ancient times to chop people into meat sauce.
(4) Withered grass. See "Kuan Salary".
(5) Plantain.
(6) Straw mat. See "Pussium stalk".
[②]［jù］
["Ji Yun" will pre-cut, go to imperial, fine. ]
"蒩2" was passed falsely.
(1) Swamps overgrown with aquatic plants.
(2) Through "ju". Moist. See "Kuan 2 Leak".
Chu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　菹; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1040 Page 09
[Tang Yun] The side fish is cut, and the sound is lingering. [Said the text] The vegetables are also. 【Release name】Kuan, hinder also. It is brewed, so that it is blocked from the cold and warm, and it must not be rotten. [Poetry·Xiaoya] There are melons in the Xinjiang area, which is peeling or smashing. 【Ritual·Sacrificial System】Potassium of water plants. [Note] The genus of celery. 【Hou Mako Records】Cut it carefully and call it 轑, and the whole thing is 轉. Nowadays, all the words in China are 轉轉.　 [Ji Yun] Zi Xie cut, sound sound. Ze Sheng Cao said 菹. [Mencius] To drive away snakes and dragons, and to let go of them.　Also place name. [Biography of the Emperor Mu] The southern expedition is as far as Kan. #Research: [[Poetry·Xiaoya] There are melons in the battlefield] 　 I would like to change the battlefield according to the original.
